title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
synopsis: In Taisho-era Japan, Tanjiro Kamado is a kind and gentle boy who lives with his family in the mountains. One day, his whole family is attacked and slaughtered by demons except for his sister Nezuko, who is turned into a demon herself. Tanjiro sets out on a journey to find a way to turn Nezuko back into a human and to kill the demon who killed his family.
ending_theme: from the edge by FictionJunction feat. Aimer

title: Attack on Titan
synopsis: Centuries ago, humanity was forced to retreat behind enormous walls to escape the threat of gigantic man-eating humanoids called Titans. The story follows Eren Yeager, his adopted sister Mikasa Ackerman, and his childhood friend Armin Arlert, who vow to retaliate against the Titans after a Titan brings about the death of Eren's mother.
opening_theme: Guren no Yumiya by Linked Horizon
ending_theme: Yuugure no Tori by YOSHIKI feat. Hyde

title: Bleach
synopsis: Ichigo Kurosaki is a 15-year-old boy who can see ghosts. One day, he meets Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper who is on a mission to kill a Hollow, a malevolent lost soul. Rukia is injured in battle, and she transfers her Soul Reaper powers to Ichigo so that he can protect his family from the Hollow. Ichigo agrees to help Rukia find the Hollow and return her powers.
ending_theme: Life is Like a Boat by Rie Fu
